pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.5: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.6: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.10: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.13: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.16: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.18: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.21: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā—‘ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī’ti vuccamānā—‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasameyya na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.1.8: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.1.17: “Neva vūpasamessāmi na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.2: Upasampannāya vematikā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.4: Anupasampannāya adhikaraṇaṃ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
